sentence.Network_en: Innumerable books have been written on the subject.
sentence.Network_cn: 已经有无数书籍写过这个主题。

sentence.Network_en: The innumerable stars in the sky are too far from us.
sentence.Network_cn: 天上无数的星星离我们太远了.

sentence.Network_en: In the endless flow of absolute truth there are innumerable relative truths.
sentence.Network_cn: 在绝对真理的长河中有无数相对真理.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... innocent 无辜的 innumerable 无数的 inquire 询问;调查.
求英语写作好用短语_百度知道 ... 91．更多地强调 put more emphasis on… 无数 innumerable;countless 非常多（大）的 tremendous.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... numerous a 数目众多的 innumerable a 数不清的 supernumerary a 额外的，多余的.
数的多音字组词_百度知道 ... 数 SU 数不清〖 innumerable;becountless〗 数不上，数不着〖 notcountasimportant〗.

list.abs: Avionics is software - innumerable lines of code that help to keep today ' s by - wire planes safely aloft ., 航空电子设备属于软件 , 为了保证当今电脑控制的飞机安全飞行 , 需要编写无数行代码.
the silent is an innumerable words ., 沉默就是千言万语.
帮我解释一下千字_百度知道 ... 千万[ be sure] 千辛万苦[ innumerable hardships] 千言万语[ thousands and thousands of words].
He took the innumerable bags with which she travelled and scattered them the attendants ., 他拿起她带着旅行的许多袋子 , 把它们分发给的随从们.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin innumerabilis, from in- 'not' + numerabilis (see numerable)

entry.def: Innumerable means very many, or too many to be counted.

example.ex: He has invented innumerable excuses, told endless lies.
example.tran: 他编造了数不清的借口和谎话。

auth_sentence.content: The springs that rise on it are almost innumerable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The springs that rise on it are almost innumerable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The springs that rise on it are almost innumerable.

auth_sentence.content: It is the work that inspired innumerable detective novelists.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is the work that inspired innumerable detective novelists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is the work that inspired innumerable detective novelists.

auth_sentence.content: I've had innumerable opportunities to buy ski areas.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've had innumerable opportunities to buy ski areas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've had innumerable opportunities to buy ski areas.

stems_affixes.word_buile: numer数目+ous……的→adj.众多的,许多的,大批的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定额以外的人,临时雇工
stems_affixes.word_buile: super超过+numer数目+ary人→n.定额以外的人,临时雇工
e出+numer数目+ate表动词→按数列出

sentences.en: Technological innovations have brought innumerable benefits.
sentences.cn: 技术革新已经带来了无穷的好处。

jushi.english: Innumerable wild animals inhabit in the woods.
jushi.chinese: 无数的野生动物生活在森林中。

jushi.english: Technological innovations have brought innumerable benefits.
